object.name: PollAnswer
object.description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.
object.html_description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.
object.rst_description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.

annotations.description: The chat that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter is anonymous
annotations.html_description: Optional. The chat that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter is anonymous
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The chat that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter is anonymous
annotations.name: voter_chat

annotations.description: The user that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter isn't anonymous
annotations.html_description: Optional. The user that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter isn't anonymous
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The user that changed the answer to the poll, if the voter isn't anonymous
annotations.name: user

annotations.description: 0-based identifiers of chosen answer options. May be empty if the vote was retracted.
annotations.html_description: 0-based identifiers of chosen answer options. May be empty if the vote was retracted.
annotations.rst_description: 0-based identifiers of chosen answer options. May be empty if the vote was retracted.
annotations.name: option_ids
